src.model.model.get_data(df, y_col='1RM') → tuple[list[float], list[float]]

Get workout-timestamps and 1RM estimates

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – Pandas dataframe with workout-timestamps and either 1RM estimates or volume

  • y_col (str) – String signifying whether to use 1RM estimates or volume

Returns:

workout-timestamps and either 1RM estimates or volume

Return type:

tuple[list[float], list[float]]

src.model.model.get_df(log, splits: list[str] = ['chest', 'push', 'chest_and_back'], exercise: str = 'barbell_bench_press') → DataFrame

  • exercise (str, optional) – _description_, defaults to “barbell_bench_press”

_description_

src.model.model.one_rep_max_estimator(df: DataFrame, formula='acsm') → DataFrame
acsm_1rm, epley or brzycki formulas

are used to implement the 1RM estimation

ACSM 1RM formula .. math:

rac{w}{ rac{100 - r cdot 2.5}{100}}

Epley 1RM formula .. math:

w \cdot

rac{1 + r}{30}}

Brzycki 1RM formula .. math:

w \cdot

rac{36}{37 - r}

param df:

_description_

type df:

pd.DataFrame

param formula:

_description_, defaults to “acsm”

type formula:

str, optional

return:

_description_

rtype:

pd.DataFrame
